page.title: 05DUNDONALD LEISURE
page.content: Dundonald has a good variety of activities and clubs and most people can find something to interest them. 1. The Bowling Club _ The club is for both men and women.The green is well_tended and in excellent condition.People can go there for a quiet night out.There is a bar where drinks are quite cheap. 2. There are two Public Houses in the area.One of them has a disco for younsters over 18 every Saturday night.The other one has pool tables, discos,bar lunches and accomodation for travellers. 3. Dundonald has many beautiful woods close to it where people can enjoy walks,sausage sizzles,camping and good,clean,fresh air.
